pages.text: Gilded books serve as an alternative to mundane Books for enchanting in the $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$(/l). Being much more receptive for magic, the enchanting process will be both faster and cheaper.$(br)They can even be used to copy enchantments from all kinds of Items in the Item Bowls around the Enchanter onto itself (not just from other Enchanted Books).

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)All is not gold that glitters.$(br)These books, however, are.
